institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training project operation rules/Article 12 (business group work)
contents: Article 12 (Business of business group) ① Cooperatives and organizations must perform the following tasks: 1. Establishing a collaboration system with joint training centers, related companies for each industry and industry, industry-specific personnel committees, etc., 2. Finding agreement companies, 3. Joint training center support and management, 4. Preparation and submission of quarterly training course operation plan, 5. Holding industry and corporate meetings, 6. Training demand survey and customized training course, development of educational materials 7. Promotion of training course, 8. Other. Tasks determined by the chairman, ② The joint training center must perform the following tasks: 1. Discovering partner companies, establishing and managing a network system for partner companies 2. Supporting training demand surveys and training course development led by cooperatives and organizations 3. Management and consultation of trainees, selection and management of teachers and instructors, implementation of education and training, 4. Administrative tasks such as training course management and fee application, 5. Operation and on-site inspection of partner training institutions, budget Management, performance and performance management, 6. Tasks such as performance and performance management of industry-led training projects, 7. Promotion of training courses, 8. Other tasks determined by the chairman, ③ Persons in charge of receiving labor cost support under Article 26 are those in Paragraph 1. and Paragraph 2, other duties cannot be performed.
